MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH2 postcode area of Chester affecting properties in Lumley Road, Churchward Close and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5:10AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:25AM on 8th February 2021
